html: When working families can’t afford health care, they can’t get ahead. High insurance costs are holding us all back. The Health Care Affordability Act would make lower-cost options available to up to 78% of #FL26 uninsured residents. #ProtectOurCarepic.twitter.com/dmoGXLRjFV
text: When working families can’t afford health care, they can’t get ahead. High insurance costs are holding us all back. The Health Care Affordability Act would make lower-cost options available to up to 78% of #FL26 uninsured residents. #ProtectOurCarepic.twitter.com/dmoGXLRjFV

html: Under the Health Care Affordability Act, a typical Florida family of four making $110,000 would see their premiums fall by $747 per month. That would cut their premium for benchmark marketplace coverage by almost half. #ProtectOurCarepic.twitter.com/QTvGzNABFt
text: Under the Health Care Affordability Act, a typical Florida family of four making $110,000 would see their premiums fall by $747 per month. That would cut their premium for benchmark marketplace coverage by almost half. #ProtectOurCarepic.twitter.com/QTvGzNABFt

html: One thing that became clear on my #FL26 health care tour: Americans are paying too much for health insurance. I’m proud to support the Health Care Affordability Act to ensure no one who buys their own insurance has to pay more than 8.5% of their income on premiums #ProtectOurCarepic.twitter.com/mAulpfA9GB

html: I remember when the country stood silent at the news of the Columbine shooting. I thought “This is it. This is when the laws change.” They didn’t. 20 years later, I still fear losing my kids to a bullet. I’m in Congress because it’s time for those laws to change. #HonorWithAction

html: I have witnessed foreign leaders abuse their powers and break down democratic institutions. We cherish the separation of powers and our system of checks and balances. The same can’t be said for other countries. I am worried that Trump is undermining countless democratic values.
text: I have witnessed foreign leaders abuse their powers and break down democratic institutions. We cherish the separation of powers and our system of checks and balances. The same can’t be said for other countries. I am worried that Trump is undermining countless democratic values.

html: There are many issues with the report that Barr must address, and we also expect Robert Mueller to testify regarding his investigation. The Administration must be held accountable for acts that have bordered on criminality. The American people deserve to know the truth.
text: There are many issues with the report that Barr must address, and we also expect Robert Mueller to testify regarding his investigation. The Administration must be held accountable for acts that have bordered on criminality. The American people deserve to know the truth.

html: There are numerous examples of Trump and those close to him obstructing justice, including destroying evidence and exerting undue influence over people involved in the investigation.
text: There are numerous examples of Trump and those close to him obstructing justice, including destroying evidence and exerting undue influence over people involved in the investigation.

html: I am troubled not just by how Barr released the report but also by the evidence that is in the report and the amount of redacted material.
text: I am troubled not just by how Barr released the report but also by the evidence that is in the report and the amount of redacted material.

html: Barr appears willing to undermine the independence of his own Department in order to protect President Trump. Barr has been dishonest in saying the President is clear of wrongdoing. Barr’s previous summary he provided to Congress was not the full picture.
text: Barr appears willing to undermine the independence of his own Department in order to protect President Trump. Barr has been dishonest in saying the President is clear of wrongdoing. Barr’s previous summary he provided to Congress was not the full picture.

html: Since the report came out earlier today, my staff and I have been going through it and closely examining both the evidence and the findings. First, I am concerned about Attorney General Barr’s leadership and his mishandling of the investigation.
text:
Since the report came out earlier today, my staff and I have been going through it and closely examining both the evidence and the findings.

First, I am concerned about Attorney General Barr’s leadership and his mishandling of the investigation.

html: There remains a major lack of transparency about what is occurring within the Homestead facility’s walls. What we do know: detaining innocent children and separating families is cruel. html: As a leading voice for commonsense gun reform, I was proud that the House-passed VAWA closes the #boyfriendloophole by blocking anyone convicted of stalking or assaulting a dating partner from obtaining firearms. It’s simple: violent criminals and abusers should not own guns.

html: Let's do everything we can to make our communities safer for everyone and #EndGunViolence #HR1112 #CharlestonLoophole
text:
Let's do everything we can to make our communities safer for everyone and #EndGunViolence
#HR1112 #CharlestonLoophole

html: FBI analysis of the current background check system shows that 3 business days isn't enough time to decide if someone shouldn’t be allowed to own a gun. #HR1112 gives them the time they need to conduct a thorough investigation.
text: FBI analysis of the current background check system shows that 3 business days isn't enough time to decide if someone shouldn’t be allowed to own a gun. #HR1112 gives them the time they need to conduct a thorough investigation.

html: In 2017, 6,004 background checks were denied after the initial 3-day waiting period. #HR1112 would allow the FBI more time to run background checks so we can stop prohibited gun owners from slipping through the cracks.
text: In 2017, 6,004 background checks were denied after the initial 3-day waiting period.  #HR1112 would allow the FBI more time to run background checks so we can stop prohibited gun owners from slipping through the cracks.

html: The #CharlestonLoophole allows someone to purchase a firearm even if their background check has not been completed within the 3-day period. This is dangerous and allows people with criminal backgrounds and mental illnesses to become gun owners.https://nyti.ms/2ED9VHl
text: The #CharlestonLoophole allows someone to purchase a firearm even if their background check has not been completed within the 3-day period.  This is dangerous and allows people with criminal backgrounds and mental illnesses to become gun owners.https://nyti.ms/2ED9VHl

html: Americans overwhelmingly support background checks. Yet the #CharlestonLoophole allows someone to buy a firearm even if the background check hasn't been completed. I believe a gun sale shouldn't be made if the background check hasn't been completed. Period. #HR1112https://twitter.com/WhipClyburn/status/1101108506944552961 …
text:
Americans overwhelmingly support background checks. Yet the #CharlestonLoophole allows someone to buy a firearm even if the background check hasn't been completed. 

I believe a gun sale shouldn't be made if the background check hasn't been completed. 

Period.

#HR1112https://twitter.com/WhipClyburn/status/1101108506944552961 …

html: I had a full and busy week in Washington, DC! I was sad not to get much time in #FL26, but I was excited to have my son, Jude, shadowing me and learning the ins and outs of Congress! I am really looking forward to being back in the district next week. Here is my #WeeklyWrapup:

#SinceParkland, the advocacy of MSD survivors has:
 Increased FL voter registration by 41%
 Banned bump stocks nationwide
 Raised the minimum age to buy an AR-15 in FL
 Led to the first @HouseJudiciary Hearing on gun violence #HR8

html: I questioned Acting Attorney General Matt Whitaker at the @HouseJudiciary hearing, where I asked the basic question of whether or not the government should protect the rights of transgender people. I also sought answers about how non-partisan his former organization really was.
text: I questioned Acting Attorney General Matt Whitaker at the @HouseJudiciary hearing, where I asked the basic question of whether or not the government should protect the rights of transgender people. I also sought answers about how non-partisan his former organization really was.

html: I presided over the floor as the first South American immigrant to ever do so, and during a special order hour lead by formerly-undocumented immigrant, Rep. Adriano Espaillat -- a monumental moment for American immigrants!

html: I co-signed the #RebuildAmericasSchools Act, which authorizes bold investment in public school facilities to create jobs, improve educational equality, and create better working conditions for teachers and school employees in every state.
text: I co-signed the #RebuildAmericasSchools Act, which authorizes bold investment in public school facilities to create jobs, improve educational equality, and create better working conditions for teachers and school employees in every state.

html: I co-signed the Veteran Treatment Court Coordination Act, which helps veterans suffering from both physical and mental war wounds by allowing veterans charged with a non-violent crime attributed to physical or mental issues to receive comprehensive treatment instead of jail time.
text: I co-signed the Veteran Treatment Court Coordination Act, which helps veterans suffering from both physical and mental war wounds by allowing veterans charged with a non-violent crime attributed to physical or mental issues to receive comprehensive treatment instead of jail time.

html: I co-signed the Conflicts from Political Fundraising Act, addressing the fact that the American people should have the right to know when a presidential appointee has helped to raise money or made contributions to industries and political causes that they may soon be regulating.
text: I co-signed the Conflicts from Political Fundraising Act, addressing the fact that the American people should have the right to know when a presidential appointee has helped to raise money or made contributions to industries and political causes that they may soon be regulating.

html: I co-signed the Undetectable Firearms Modernization Act. This bill would prohibit the possession of firearms that are undetectable by walk-through metal detectors.
text: I co-signed the Undetectable Firearms Modernization Act. This bill would prohibit the possession of firearms that are undetectable by walk-through metal detectors.

html: I co-signed the Wildlife Innovation and Longevity Driver (WILD) Act. This bill would provide much-needed protections to the natural habitats and wildlife we love, including sea turtles. It would also help control invasive species, like the python.
text: I co-signed the Wildlife Innovation and Longevity Driver (WILD) Act. This bill would provide much-needed protections to the natural habitats and wildlife we love, including sea turtles. It would also help control invasive species, like the python.

html: On this day in 1940, the first #SocialSecurity check was issued. Social Security has allowed people who work their whole lives to retire with dignity. html: Los venezolanos necesitan desesperadamente ayuda humanitaria. Debemos actuar sin demora para ayudar aquellos que han sido afectados por la mala gestión de Maduro.
